data.name: Rogue Invader Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Music to save humanity by. Composed by Caleb Blood, the Rogue Invader soundtrack gives you equal parts orchestra (because you're a hero with a little bit of class), aggressive percussion (because you've got a wild side, but you keep it in check), and synths (because it's the future and stuff). Full-res cinematic music for a 1-bit HD gaming experience.
data.about_the_game: Music to save humanity by. Composed by Caleb Blood, the Rogue Invader soundtrack gives you equal parts orchestra (because you're a hero with a little bit of class), aggressive percussion (because you've got a wild side, but you keep it in check), and synths (because it's the future and stuff). Full-res cinematic music for a 1-bit HD gaming experience.
data.short_description: Original soundtrack to the 1-bit rogue-lite action shooter, Rogue Invader
